All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdminCreationInterfaceController
Controller for the admin creation interface.
AdminInterfaceController
Controller for the admin interface.
AttendanceContainer
Represents a container for displaying attendance information in the UI.
AttendanceController
Controller for managing attendance-related operations.
AttendanceListController
Controller for displaying a list of user attendance entries.
AttendanceModel
Represents an attendance record for a user in a course, including course ID, user ID, staff ID, attendance status, and the current attendance count.
CourseContainer
Represents a UI container for displaying course information.
CourseController
Controller for managing course-related operations.
CourseModel
Represents a course in the system, including its name, topic, description, attendance requirements, and status flags.
CryptoUtils
Utility class for cryptographic operations such as hashing and verifying data using BCrypt.
CryptoUtilsTest
 
DaoAttendance
Handler for processing attendance-related requests in the chain of responsibility.
DaoCourse
Handler for processing course-related requests in the chain of responsibility.
DaoCourseStaffJoin
Handler for processing staff-course join requests in the chain of responsibility.
DaoCourseUserJoin
Handler for processing user-course join requests in the chain of responsibility.
DaoDegree
Handler for processing degree-related requests in the chain of responsibility.
DaoStaff
Handler for processing staff-related requests in the chain of responsibility.
DaoUser
Handler for processing user-related requests in the chain of responsibility.
DbConnection
Utility class for managing the database connection to the MySQL database.
DefaultHandler
The DefaultHandler class acts as the entry point for the Chain of Responsibility pattern.
DegreeController
Controller for managing degree-related operations.
DegreeModel
Represents an academic degree with a name and ECTS credits.
Handler
Abstract base class for handling requests in a chain of responsibility pattern.
HandlerTest
 
LangUtils
Utility class for handling language and locale operations for users and staff.
LoginInterfaceController
Controller for the login interface.
LoginUtils
Utility class for handling user and staff login operations.
Main
Main entry point for the Attendance application.
MainEngine
Main engine class responsible for initializing controllers, loading the main interface, and handling user or staff session logic.
MainInterfaceController
Controller for the main user interface.
Request
Represents a request to be handled by a DAO (Data Access Object).
RequestDao
 
RequestType
 
StaffController
Controller for managing staff-related operations.
StaffModel
Represents a staff member in the system, including their ID, name, role, admin status, and language preference.
TestOperation
 
TopicController
Controller for managing topic-related operations.
TopicModel
Represents a topic with a name in the system.
Translator
Utility class for handling localization and translation using resource bundles.
UserController
Controller for managing user-related operations.
UserCourseController
Controller for managing user-course relationships.
UserModel
Represents a user in the system, including their ID, student ID, name, degree, language, and enrolled courses.
UserUtils
Utility class for user-related operations such as checking username existence and generating unique usernames for students and staff.
